title: Blackout Curtains 84 inches Long, Red Curtains Grey Curtains for Bedroom Living Room Kitchen, Abstract Painting Curtains & Drapes Darkening Grommet Thermal Insulated Curtains 2 Panels Set
features: Package Includes: Set of 2 blackout curtains; Each panel measures 52 Inch wide by 84 Inch long.
Good Fabric Drape: High quality satin polyester blended fabric, thermal Insulation and sunblock curtain. Room darkening, provide privacy and window decor appeal.

Light Blocking: Curtains block 85-95% sunlight for maximum privacy and undisturbed sleep. The blackout curtains ensure that the room temperature is regulated. Protect your indoor furniture from directly exposing to the sun.

Home Decor: These durable elegant blackout curtain panels will decorate your windows and rooms with new great effect. Widely use for bedroom, living room, patio, room divider, functional and fashionable.
Easy to care: Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures.
description: Package Include: 2 Panels pack Size ( Each Panel ): 52 inches wide and vertical - 63/84/96/108 inches long Construction: With 1.6 inches rod pocket on top Color: Red Meterial Type: 100% Polyester. Made of innovative triple-weaved blackout fabric. Top color yarn, middle blackout yarn and back color yarn interwoven to 1 layer thick drape. Silky, soft and lightweight. Suitable for: Bedroom, living room, dining room, infant room, kids room, office, media room, or other public place. Night shift, afteroon naps, late morning sleeper, or others enjoy the darken room and privacy.
